doc:
Willie Aames https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Willie_Aames 0 Willie Aames (born Albert William Upton on July 15, 1960) is an American actor, film and television director, television producer, and screenwriter. He is best known for playing Tommy Bradford, one of Tom Bradford's (played by Dick Van Patten) sons, on the 1970s television series Eight Is Enough, Buddy Lembeck on the 1980s series Charles in Charge and the title character in the direct-to-video series, Bibleman (1995–2003). Willie_Aames ( born Albert_William_Upton on July_15_,_1960 ) is an_American_actor_,_film_and_television_director , television_producer , and screenwriter . He is_best_known for playing Tommy_Bradford , one of Tom_Bradford 's_( played by Dick_Van_Patten_)_sons , on the_1970s_television_series_Eight Is Enough , Buddy_Lembeck on the_1980s_series_Charles in Charge and the_title_character in the_direct-to-video_series , Bibleman_(_1995 – 2003_) .
